WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 04 FEB
   BY M/V OCEANIC CHAMPION TOWING 12 9260 METER LONG
   CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-50.39S 039-44.19W, 21-50.33S 038-15.47W,
   22-02.50S 038-15.80W, 22-02.55S 039-44.61W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 273/18.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 05 FEB 18.
